snippet: The new leader of the streaming service would be Mike Hopkins, a veteran of Fox Networks with a focus on distribution as opposed to creating new content.
abstract: Hulu is preparing to appoint Mike Hopkins, veteran of Fox Networks, to be its next chief executive.
lead_paragraph: The new leader of the streaming service would be Mike Hopkins, a veteran of Fox Networks with a focus on distribution as opposed to creating new content.

headline.main: Hulu Is Said to Pick a New Chief Executive
headline.print_headline: Hulu Is Expected to Appoint Fox Executive as Chief
